{Jobs}

Databrew is currently looking for an experienced R/Shiny programmer / data analyst to join our team in working on awesome, impfactful projects.

Our ideal candidate:

• Would consider yourself an expert in R/Shiny programming

• Has experience with SQL and database management

• Is proficient using Rmarkdown

• Is proficient in using Github for version control

• Has some experience with Python

• Has web development experience

• Is familiar with Linux command line utilities

• Is familiar with AWS, EC2, S3

• Has experience with ODK (Open Data Kit)

• Is able to document your code and processes well

• Is self-motivated and can collaborate well with a remote team

• Is a good communicator

We encourage anyone who has all or most of the technical skills listed above to apply by filling out this form.


We will be accepting applications on a rolling basis until the position is filled. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions.

{databrew}
